definitions.title: n. pr. 1. gent.
definitions.body: ´[[הָע]] people on SW. coast of Mediterr. before the [[כַּפְתּׂרִים]] (q. v.) came De 2:23, and remaining thereafter Jos 13:3 (D:2), LXX Euaioi.

definitions.title: 2. loc.
definitions.body: ´[[הָע]] city in Benj. Jos 18:23 (= [[הָעַי]] ?), LXX Aiein, Aueim.—Vid. also [[[עַוִּי]]] supr.
